column4: Every so many minutes a 4 will be typed, a literal 4. It is not caused by a broken keyboard and it also occurs on the liveCD. Windows does not have this problem.
Just type up what you've said here, and then they'll ask you for waht you need (since they'll know)
right. And I dont suppose there's like an IRC channel where I can go before posting the report
not a great fan of bug reports, generally only go for them as a last resort. They tend to take weeks if not longer.
